comments.creator: brian@briansmith.org
comments.text: ocspclnt calls CERT_VerifyCert. We should add an option to use libpkix's CERT_PKIXVerifyCert and/or make libpkix the default.
comments.raw_text: ocspclnt calls CERT_VerifyCert. We should add an option to use libpkix's CERT_PKIXVerifyCert and/or make libpkix the default.
comments.author: brian@briansmith.org

comments.text: ocspclnt also calls CERT_CheckOCSPStatus, which indirectly calls CERT_VerifyCert.
comments.raw_text: ocspclnt also calls CERT_CheckOCSPStatus, which indirectly calls CERT_VerifyCert.
comments.creator: brian@briansmith.org
